greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Multiplicative with a(p(i)^j) = p(i+1)^a(j) for i-th prime p(i) and j>0.
comment: This sequence establishes a bijection between the natural numbers and A182318.
link: Rémy Sigrist, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: a[n_] := Block[{fi = FactorInteger@ n}, Times @@ (NextPrime[#[[1]]]^a[#[[2]]] & /@ fi)]; a[1] = 1; Array[a, 60] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 14 2016 *)
results.author: _Rémy Sigrist_, Dec 13 2016
